news.title: Millions face 'huge sticker shock' when ACA open enrollment starts Nov. 1
news.summary: Millions of households logging on to enroll in a health plan via the Affordable Care Act marketplace will see much higher premiums. Millions of households log on to sign up for a health care plan via a health insurance marketplace.

news.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says AI is in a 'virtuous cycle.' Here's what he means
news.summary: "The virtual cycle of AI has been designed, and this is ... the reason why you're seeing the world's capex going so fast," Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said.

news.title: Affirm gets boost from New York Life with $750 million loan deal
news.summary: Affirm has secured similar funding lines with Liberty Mutual Investments, PGIM, and Sixth Street Partners. Affirm is part of a trend across the buy-now-pay-later sector.

news.title: Nvidia's Huang downplays concerns over selling AI chips to Beijing: It has 'plenty' of its own
news.summary: "It's in the best interest of America to serve that China market," Nvidia CEO says. Nvidia CEO: It's in "best interest of China to have the American technology"

news.title: Chocolate's reign over Halloween is under threat from inflation, tariffs and high cocoa prices
news.summary: Chocolate prices soar nearly 30% this Halloween, pushing shoppers toward gummies and sour treats as cocoa costs and inflation haunt candy aisles.

news.title: The biggest risks of 2025 turned out to be no threat at all
news.summary: Worries about bond yields, the Fed hiking interest rates and trade wars transpired not to threaten 2025 investment returns in the end. The U.S. economy is expected to grow by 2.5 percent this year and 2.7 percent next year.

news.title: Will Palantir follow Netflix with a stock split of its own?
news.summary: A D.A. Davidson analyst “would not be surprised’ if Palantir splits its stock, given that it caters heavily to retail investors and has seen a strong rally.

news.title: Here’s what’s worth streaming in November 2025 on Netflix, Hulu, HBO Max and more
news.summary: ‘Stranger Things’ kicks off its final season, ‘Pluribus’ is revealed on Apple, and ‘Landman’ returns to Paramount+.

news.title: Chevron, Exxon profits keep falling, but beat expectations as production hits records
news.summary: Falling oil prices continued to hurt earnings for both Chevron and Exxon Mobil. Both oil giants managed to beat Wall Street’s profit expectations.

news.title: I’m 53, a single parent with a $1 million home. My boyfriend wants to marry. Am I better off staying single?
news.summary: “Should I just maintain the status quo or marry the love of my life?” she asks herself. “ should I just stay the same?’ she asks.
